notfound_description: Sorry, the page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.
home_subtitle: Explore interactive UI components built with React & TypeScript
forbidden_description: You do not have permission to access this page. Please check your account or contact support.
forbidden_helpDescription: If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team or try logging in again.
error_description: Something went wrong. Please try reloading the page.
auth_invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth_registerSuccess: Register success! Please check mail to verify account
